Extracted Data.Name: DHEERAJ MADHAV RAO
Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: An analytical and business focused finance professional with experience across FP&A, inventory planning, and technology finance. Adaptive to translating complex data into actionable insights to drive strategic decisions. Proven track record in optimizing budgets, automating reporting workflows, and partnering with leadership on high impact initiatives. Proficient in Excel, SQL, Power BI, Python, and financial modeling. Actively seeking roles in Financial Analysis, Data Analytics, or Business Consulting.

Experience.Title: Senior Analyst – Inventory Replenishment Planning
Experience.Description: Led forecasting for high impact inventory categories aligned to corporate goals. Built Power BI dashboards to automate metrics reporting, saving 60% effort. Partnered cross functionally to evaluate excess inventory pricing and markdowns. Automated recurring reports using SQL, Excel, and Power Automate workflows. Delivered business insights to senior leadership on stock health and velocity.

Experience.Title: Analyst – Technology Finance
Experience.Description: Managed $500M software budget portfolio; identified $2.5M in savings. Built a Python based tracker to monitor forecasts and accruals, saving 10+ hrs/month. Automated workflows and reports using ChatGPT, Python, and Power Automate. Provided cost, variance, and forecast insights to cross functional stakeholders.

Experience.Title: Associate Intern
Experience.Description: Developed and tested Python based F&O strategies for institutional clients. Delivered trading and risk management insights to improve portfolio outcomes. Created models to manage leverage and reduce drawdown impact.

Experience.Title: Civil & Project Engineer
Experience.Description: Oversaw 1000 crore CIDCO housing project across 15 contractors. Ensured structural and material quality; resolved site level issues in real time. Delivered foundation slabs in record 6 month cycles to maintain timelines.

Projects: Stock Indicator App: Developed a Python tool to backtest strategies using technical indicators for retail traders.
X Culture Challenge: Designed a go to market strategy with international teammates for a real business client.
SCOT Store Project: Led vendor outreach and collected feedback for sustainable store relaunch planning.

Recommendations: **Quantify achievements** within your experience descriptions using numbers and data to showcase the impact of your contributions.
Add **relevant soft skills** to the skills section, such as communication, teamwork, problem-solving, and leadership, to demonstrate a well-rounded skillset.
Include any **relevant certifications** to showcase expertise and commitment to professional development in your field.
Consider **reformatting the resume** to be more concise, potentially reducing it to one page to improve readability for recruiters.
Elaborate more on the **impact and outcomes** achieved within the projects section to highlight your practical skills and problem-solving abilities.
In the **Civil & Project Engineer** role, add the company name for clarity.
Provide the **complete name** of the college in education section, do not use abbreviations.

RESUME_TIPS: In your experience at Lowe's India, quantify the impact of your Power BI dashboards on inventory management. For example, mention a **reduction in stockouts** or **improvement in inventory turnover ratio** resulting from your **data analytics**.

Detail your experience with **replenishment planning** in your role at Lowe's, explaining how you used **forecasting** to optimize inventory levels. Quantify the impact, such as reducing excess inventory by a certain percentage or improving **store fill rates**.

Under Skills, add **ABC classification** and **EOQ** to demonstrate your knowledge of inventory management techniques. Then, in your Lowe's India role descriptions, explicitly mention how you used these techniques to optimize inventory.

Expand on your experience with inventory optimization by including examples of how you handled **slow-moving** and **overstocked items**. Describe specific actions you took, such as implementing markdown strategies or redistributing stock, and quantify the results.

Include the term **merchandising analytics** in your profile or skills section to highlight your experience in aligning inventory with sales strategies. Then, in your experience, mention how you collaborated with the merchandising team to adjust forecasts for new launches.

Mention any experience with **omnichannel inventory** management, even if limited. Describe how you balanced inventory across different channels (e.g., online vs. physical stores) to maximize sales and minimize stockouts.

Under skills, add experience with **ERP systems** like **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce**, if applicable. If you have used similar systems, highlight their relevance to inventory management and data analysis.

In your projects, explain how you utilized **data analysis** for inventory or supply chain optimization. Mention any specific techniques you used to analyze **stock** levels and make informed decisions.

Describe how you used SQL to automate inventory reports and dashboards at Lowe's. Mention specific SQL queries or scripts you developed to extract and analyze inventory data, highlighting any efficiency gains achieved.

In your roles, showcase how you contributed to key performance indicators (**KPIs**) such as **forecast accuracy**, **inventory turnover ratio**, and **stock out %**. Quantify your contributions and the positive impact on these metrics.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Master Zoho Inventory for managing stock, orders, and fulfillment processes.
Learn how to use Zoho Inventory to manage your products, orders, and warehouses.
